channel.title: SSH Keys on 4wayhandshake
channel.description: Recent content in SSH Keys on 4wayhandshake

item.title: MonitorsThree
item.description: INTRODUCTION MonitorsThree was released as the fourth box of HTB’s season 6, Heist. It’s an interesting addition to the “Monitors” line of boxes, all of which prominently feature the Cacti monitoring tool. This box took a little bit of research to complete, but was generally on the easier side of “medium”. Recon was almost nonessential. Once you discover the cacti subdomain, you’re ready to proceed. Fingerprint the two apps you’ve discovered, then check out the main monitorsthree app in more detail.

item.title: Analytics
item.description: INTRODUCTION At the time of writing this walkthrough, Analytics is still active. The box centers around a fictional analytics company that provides data analysis services using the infrastructure they’re hosting. The company is running a popular open-source analytics / BI platform. This box uses a modern architecture, reflective of how real websites run these days (when they’re on-prem). For each step of Analytics, the skill emphasis is placed firmly on enumeration.
